name: Escape The Woods
description:
Escape The woods is a legend of Zelda lost woods inspired Game!

This is a simple game of exploring and memorization but fear not mortals! this game has over 10 hours of content and and expansion pack.

                 How to play the game

W,A,S,D Are Your Movement Controls!

Try To Find Your Way Out Of The Woods!

                        Features Coming soon! 

Darkness mode!

Maze Maker!

Multiplayer

Race Mode

                                             Thanks For Playing
